history.proof: intros x n. induction n. - simpl. rewrite mult_one_r. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. scongruence use: mult_assoc.

original: intros x n. induction n. - simpl. rewrite mult_one_r. rewrite mult_one_l. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite pow_n_plus. rewrite <- IHn. rewrite pow_n_plus. rewrite mult_assoc. reflexivity.
